markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Folding Ladder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1396)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 92</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 2

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 1 3 unfolded
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This multi-hinged, 10-foot ladder is useful for climbing upward or across dangerous pits. You can fold or unfold the ladder with two total Interact actions, which don't need to be consecutive.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Folding Ladder
